players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Charlie was killed, so the mafia is clearly active. We need to be careful who we trust today."
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Bob: "I am the detective and investigated Alice last night. She is the mafioso, not me. Alice is lying to save herself."
You: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and he is mafioso. Diana, please trust me and vote Bob out."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
